name: trees
description:
The trees command extracts vegetation features from OSM data including:

- Individual trees with species information
- Tree rows (linear plantings)
- Woods and forested areas

Includes botanical details like species, genus, leaf type, and physical dimensions.

options.--type: Tree feature type: tree, tree_row, wood, all (default: all)
options.-f, --format: Output format: geojson, json, csv (default: geojson)

output:
Tree features with:
- type: tree, tree_row, or wood
- species: Scientific species name
- species_common: Common name
- genus: Botanical genus
- leaf_type: broadleaved, needleleaved
- leaf_cycle: deciduous, evergreen
- height: Tree height
- circumference: Trunk circumference
- diameter_crown: Crown diameter
